name.description: Specifies the name of the NAT Gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group in which the NAT Gateway should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the NAT Gateway should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

idle_timeout_in_minutes.description: The idle timeout which should be used in minutes. Defaults to `4`.

public_ip_address_ids.description: A list of Public IP Address ID's which should be associated with the NAT Gateway resource.

public_ip_prefix_ids.description: A list of Public IP Prefix ID's which should be associated with the NAT Gateway resource.

sku_name.description: The SKU which should be used. At this time the only supported value is `Standard`. Defaults to `Standard`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zones.description: A list of availability zones where the NAT Gateway should be provisioned. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the NAT Gateway.

resource_guid.description: The resource GUID property of the NAT Gateway.

create.description: Used when creating the NAT Gateway.

update.description: Used when updating the NAT Gateway.

read.description: Used when retrieving the NAT Gateway.

delete.description: Used when deleting the NAT Gateway.
